text: Guillermo Pellegrini (born 25 November 1945) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in the individual dressage event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Guillermo Pellegrini
